chart.name: chart:chart.project.progress.per.month
chart.title: Project progress per month
chart.dataset:
SELECT SUM(p.percentage) AS progress, MONTH(p.startDate) AS month, _employeeName.name AS employeeName FROM Project p
LEFT JOIN p.employeeName AS _employeeName WHERE YEAR(p.startDate) = YEAR(current_date)
GROUP BY _employeeName.name, MONTH(p.startDate) ORDER BY month

chart.name: chart.project.progress.per.month.pie
chart.title: Project progress by percentage
chart.dataset:
SELECT SUM(p.percentage) AS progress, UPPER(p.name) AS name
FROM Project p
GROUP BY name
